title: Fire in the sea
creator_credit: Bert Van Bork and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Views the movement of lava in the countryside and into the sea, as Kilauea, the second greatest volcanic eruption in Hawaii’s history occurs. Suitable for upper primary level.
